mapper.select: SELECT db.doc_id AS docId, d.doc_title AS title, d.created_at AS createdAt, e.employee_name AS writerName, db.is_read AS isRead, db.read_at AS readAt, db.role AS role FROM document_box db JOIN draft_documents d ON db.doc_id = d.doc_id JOIN employee e ON d.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE db.employee_id = #{employeeId} AND db.role = '참조자' AND db.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY d.created_at DESC
